attributes.action: Stop British First from further harrassment and invasion of Crayford Mosque
attributes.additional_details:
British First have intimidated, harassed, offended, threatened and invaded worshipers at Crayford Mosque.

They have been filming inside the Mosque against worshipers will and are violating worshipers rights and privacy.

This petition is focusing to demand that a law is put in place where it is a criminal offence to intimidate, harass, offend, threaten, invade and film worshipers in a place of worship.

Help protect the Mosque so known offenders should not be allowed to enter Crayford Mosque or be within a certain vincity of the Mosque if the intent is to intimidate, harass, offend, and threaten.

Everybody should be allowed to worship and have their own beliefs without feeling scared or threatened, this is not just about a religion this is about going against a individuals human rights in their own country where they are British Citizens.
Action a law and action for a change.
